newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy's Consob approves Seat spinoff prospectus.
newsitem.headline: Italy's Consob approves Seat spinoff prospectus.

text.p: Italian stock market watchdog Consob gave the go-ahead for the publication of a prospectus detailing the planned spinoff of telecom group Stet's yellow pages subsidiary Seat, a Consob source said on Thursday.
The move means that Seat can list ordinary and savings shares on the stock exchange once the spinoff has been completed and Seat has been constituted as an incorporated company.
After Seat is hived off the majority stake in the company prior to its privatisation will be held by industrial holding company IRI. Milan newsroom +392-66102321
